P

placeShip(String, int[], int[]) - Method in class game.Human
Called by the GUI when a ship has been placed on the battlefield.
placeShips() - Method in class game.AI
Placing out the ships and it will override the Player class method placeShips() and call the method setShip()
placeShips() - Method in class game.Human
Called by the GameEngine when this player should place it's ships.
placeShips() - Method in class game.Player
Called in the beginning of the game when the player should place it's ships.
Player - Class in game
The base class for all players.
Player(String, ZoneListener) - Constructor for class game.Player
Construct a battlefield and a fleet.
printHighScore() - Method in class game.GameEngine
This updates the current high score list and makes the gui print it
